# Biography

I am a Junior at the University of Texas at Austin. I have a 3.97 GPA and have received many honors from UT, including college scholar, CNS second year excellence award, and most recently I was named an Unrestricted Presidential Endowed Scholar. When I finish my undergraduate degree, I hope to go to graduate school for genetic counseling. 

## Skills

I am a quick learner and am good with troubleshooting technology issues. I have leadership and teamwork experience, and I work well with others. I am familiar with R coding and have some research experience.
